errors.message:
Error: Illegal type specification for `Data.Heap.Binominal.Node`
    Data.Heap.Binominal.Node :: forall a .
                                Data.Heap.Binominal._rank:GHC.Types.Int -> Data.Heap.Binominal._root:{VV : a | _root <= VV} -> Data.Heap.Binominal.subtrees:[(Data.Heap.Binominal.Tree {VV : a | _root <= VV})] -> {VV : (Data.Heap.Binominal.Tree a) | subtrees VV == subtrees
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        && _root VV == _root
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        && _rank VV == _rank
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        && root VV == _root}
    Sort Error in Refinement: {VV : a##azU | Data.Heap.Binominal._root <= VV}
    Invalid Relation Data.Heap.Binominal._root <= VV with operand types func(0 , [(Data.Heap.Binominal.Tree @(42)); @(42)]) and a##azU
